TopicTitle: Make a ship that can orbit this space satation

Articles.Content: I made a station segment and I've tried for hours to find a craft that could take it to orbit. I couldn't make a craft to get it off the ground so i'm challenging you guys to make one! all you have to do is copy this to a notepad and make it a .CRAFT file http://pastebin.com/3nBWy7CV
Rocket builders bro.
Use Hyperedit.

51t payload, here's what I'd do:

Booster:

1x Mammoth

2x S3-14400

Transstage/ orbital injection

1x Rhino

1x S3-3600

1x S3-7200

I've make a 60 ton payload to LKO launcher 3 months ago. I called it The Heavy Package Deliverer Three ! I use it for so many usage like missile because it's got a missile design lol

So this isn't really a challenge. This is "help me orbit my stuff". That being said...

This: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65982-Lothsahn-s-Super-Heavy-Lifter-250T-LKO

250T to LKO.

That'll do what you need. And that's even using pre-mammoth and Kerbodyne parts.
A bid overboard on the moniprop.
